thread.title: Child as soldier in gripping, disturbing ‘Beasts of No Nation’
thread.title_full: Child as soldier in gripping, disturbing ‘Beasts of No Nation’ - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Mick LaSalle
title: Child as soldier in gripping, disturbing ‘Beasts of No Nation’
text:
Photo: Associated Press Idris Elba is the charismatic and sadistic commandant in “Beasts of No Nation,” a war movie set in an unnamed African country. Idris Elba is the charismatic and sadistic commandant in “Beasts...
“Beasts of No Nation” belongs to an unusual and useful category of film that explains something otherwise impossible to understand. It’s a war movie, set in Africa, and tells the story of a child soldier and how he goes, in a matter of months, from happy innocence, surrounded by family, to hacking a guy’s brains out with a sword.
